title: Client Bug
body: When champ select opened up there was no champions shown. I tried to filter but still no champions showed. The client then crashed and froze on the screen shown in the second screenshot. I don't know how common this issue is

replies.body: If you continue getting this issue, then I recommend [submitting a support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They'll help you collect some logs on the issue and may be able to figure out what is going on.
